title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.6 - Adjustments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.6 - Adjustments

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the provisions of section
152.2
of this Part, employees
subject to the provisions of this Part, whose basic annual salary, after the
addition of the salary increases provided by section
152.2, is less than the hiring rate
of the salary grade of their positions as specified in the salary grade
schedule contained in sections
152.3
and
152.4
of this Part, shall have
their basic annual salary increased to such hiring rate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
152.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
